title: Youthful idiocies
author: VD
content_html:
There was a small protest London today, with a number of not-terribly youthful youth handing out flyers to advertise an anti-Nazi rally against… the anti-EU British National Party. You have to be either pretty young or pretty stupid to not recognize that the organization that is most similar to the Nazis would probably be the anti-democratic, anti-free speech one led by Germans that has taken over nearly the entire continent of Europe.

In a sane world, no one who is still in college or is employed by a college would be permitted to have any say in anyone’s affairs but their own. There’s a reason the Constitution doesn’t permit anyone to run for office until they’re 35; let the under-30s drink and do all the drugs they want and none of them will give a damn about not voting anyhow.
